medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse severe abdominal pain with nausea and small nonbloody nonbilious vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started diffuse throughout the entire abdomen for 1 day, then progressed to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The pain was more severe for roughly 30 minutes to an hour this morning prior to arrival at the emergency department. Denies any fevers or chills.
